name: Excuse Me Sir! Do You Have A License To Keep Your Distance?
name_original: Excuse Me Sir! Do You Have A License To Keep Your Distance?
description:
This game was made for the TriJam #68, themed "Keep Your Distance". It took 3.5 hours to complete.

In this game you play as Johnny, also known as Bush Man. Despite an alarming number of restraining orders, you seek to defy the police and continue to stalk your victims. Just remember, (Don't) Keep Your Distance.

WASD - Move
QE - Rotate
Middle Click - Pan
Scroll - Zoom

Bottles and Co. Ltd. Est. 2014
Code by Kit Zellerbach
Art by Mike Wilson
